events.name: Techstars IoT in Singapore
events.description:
Sign up for free here: bit.ly/2kmlYPA

Techstars is Recruiting in Singapore for the First Time - all the way from NYC!

Internet of Things brings with it incredible opportunity, as well as incredible responsibility. As our devices, homes, cars, cities, organizations and lives become more and more connected, the safe use of our personal data is paramount. Join us for a discussion on IoT, where the opportunities lie, and how to keep innovating, followed by networking with other entrepreneurs, investors and executives in the IoT space.

Agenda
6:30 PM - Registration and Check-in
7:00 PM - Introduction to the Techstars IOT Accelerator - What Startups Need to Know
7:30 PM - Chat with Angelia Müller (Program Manager, Techstars IOT)
8:00 PM - Q&A + Networking + Refreshments

events.name: Papers We Love #025
events.description:
Paper #1: Typed Self-Evaluation via Intensional Type Functions http://compiler.cs.ucla.edu/popl17/popl17-full.pdf - Matt Brown & Jens Palsberg - Érdi Gergő

Paper #2: ??
-------------------

What was the last paper within the realm of computing/technology you read and loved?

What did it inspire you to build or tinker with? 

Come share the ideas in an awesome academic/research paper with fellow engineers, programmers, and paper-readers. 

Lead a session and show off code that you wrote that implements these ideas or just give us the lowdown about the paper (because of HARD MATH!). Otherwise, just come, listen, and discuss.

-----------------

Original Meetup : http://www.meetup.com/papers-we-love
Papers Repo : https://github.com/papers-we-love/papers-we-love
Code of Conduct : https://github.com/papers-we-love/papers-we-love/blob/master/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md
events.location: HackerspaceSG, 344B King George's Avenue, King George's Building, Singapore 208576
